short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that allows you to use the UBC Workday calendar term by term.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to filter the Workday's registered courses by term. It enlarges the popup window and adjusts the text size to solve the cut-off issue.
 
** NEW FEATURE **
You can now export the workday calendar to your local calendar app!
